Purpose / Notes: Berth allocation request for MZP port call

Document: Method Statement (AD Ports format, incl. weather criteria)
Purpose / Notes: Approved MS for cargo loading/offloading; include weather limits

Document: Risk Assessment – RoRo Operations (AD Ports format)
Purpose / Notes: RA for RoRo/Loadout operations

Document: Risk Assessment – Hot Work on LCT (AD Ports format)
Purpose / Notes: RA for hot work activities
Cargo stowage arrangement on LCT
Intact stability and ballast plan for loadout stages

Document: RoRo Simulation Drawing / SPMT Load Distribution Plan
Purpose / Notes: RoRo simulation and SPMT load distribution to confirm deck/berth limits

Remarks: If port-provided ramp, OFCO to advise

Purpose / Notes: Mooring arrangement for port stay and cargo ops
Lashing arrangement for cargo during voyage
Plan for critical lifting activities (if any)
Certificates for SPMT/linkspan/lifting gear, etc.
SPMT certification and inspection documents
Calibration certificates for welding machines
Welder qualification certificates

Cargo declaration prior to arrival (agent submission)

Undertaking letter as required by port/authorities

Document: PTW – Land Oversized & Heavy Load (SPMT operations)
Purpose / Notes: Land permit required for SPMT movement/operations
Remarks: OFCO advised 2–3 working days; weekend may extend

Purpose / Notes: Summary line for NOC submission prior to proceeding to AGI; package includes Trading License, RA+ERP, No Objection letters, Voyage Plan, Route Map, and Contract Award Letter copy (see items below).
Remarks: OFCO advised AD Maritime NOC required before proceeding to AGI.

Purpose / Notes: Required for AD Maritime NOC application

Document: Detailed Risk Assessment & Emergency Response Plan
Purpose / Notes: Required for NOC; include ERP
